ygData.subject: Please, people
ygData.msgSnippet: I appreciate the good information I get from this mailing list, and I also appreciate the interesting debates.  One thing I would request of my fellow priests
ygData.messageBody:
I appreciate the good information I get from this mailing list, and I also appreciate the interesting debates. One thing I would request of my fellow priests of light and darkness is to *please* cut out all unnecessary parts of previous posts when replying. I am a digest reader, and today I recieved a 1/4 megabyte digest. The substance of the digest was about 3-5 new messages, and many many people debating the proposed new camping rules without removing the e-baggage. This is rude for people that use slower modem connections. :)

Thanks for your time, this isn't supposed to be a firestarter. :)

Devotion
Bishop of Rodcet Nife
Povar
